Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
I te tuatahi me kōrero tātau he āhua tūturu nga cosmos, nā te mea he tino tika tēnei puka e hiahia ana ki te kore he hononga, ko te tino katoa, ko tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te āhua tino ātaahua, e tino pai ana ki te pupuri me te pupuri i ngā mea katoa; Na, ko nga wahi rangatira katoa o te ao nui, ara ko te ra, ko te marama me nga aorangi e puta mai ana i tenei ahua Nā te mea rānei e tohe ana ngā mea katoa ki te whiwhi i tēnei puka, e puta ana ki te take o te pata wai me ētahi atu tinana kūtere ki te ngana rātau ki te whakamārama i a rātau anō. Na, kaore tētahi tangata e rangirua nā nga tinana o te rangi tēnei āhua. ...
Koia i tua atu i te ui te whenua, no te mea e pehi ana i nga taha katoa i runga i tona waenganui. Ahakoa i te take o nga hua o nga maunga me nga pōreareatanga o nga awaawa kāore e taea te mārama ki te porohita tino tika, engari kaore tēnei e pā ki te āhua o te whenua. ...
E ai ki te mea kua whakaaturia kētia kei te whenua te āhua o tētahi rohe, me whakaaro tātau mēnā ka rite tonu te nekeneke ki tēnei āhua, ā, he aha te wāhi e mau ana te whenua i te ao nui. ... Ko te nuinga o nga kaituhi e whakaae ana e tū tonu ana te whenua i waenganui o te ao nui, me te whakaaro e kore e taea, e wawau ana ki te whakaaro i te tauaro. Ki te āta paunatia ia taua mea, ka kitea kahore ano kia whakataua te pātai, a kahore he tikanga kia marama te whakaaro. Ko ia huringa o te wāhi e mātakina ana, arā, ki tētahi nekehanga o te ahanoa i kitea, o te kaitirotiro rānei, ki ngā nekenekehanga rānei a ngā mea e rua. ... Na no te whenua e kitea ai te hurihanga o nga rangi, a ka hanga mo o tatou kanohi Na, ki te kore te whenua e whai i te nekehanga o tenei nekehanga ki nga mea katoa i waho o te whenua, engari ki te ahunga hangai atu i te mea ka neke nga mea katoa i runga i te whenua, a ko tenei ahua te hurihanga o ia ra. Nā reira ko tēnei te āhua nei he pānga ki te ao nui katoa, arā, ko ngā mea katoa i waho o te whenua me te okotahi kotahi o te whenua anō. Ahakoa rā, mehemea, me whakaae tētahi ehara tēnei nekeneke i te mea motuhake ki te rangi, engari i hurihuri te whenua mai i te uru ki te rāwhiti, ā, mehemea i āta whakaarotia tēnei mo te pikinga me te tautuhitanga o te rā, te marama me ngā whetū, ka kitea ko tēnei te āhuatanga tūturu."
Ko Nicolas Copernicus, ko nga hurihanga o nga tinana o te rangi, e 1543
Tērā pea ka whakamahia te whakawhitinga hei whakaaturanga i rerekē ai a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu, a Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia rerekē a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia pērā
A.he āhua kore noa iho nga kōmo

D.Kāore te Ao i te noho ā-whare
GivenAnswer: Ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai, e hāngai ana ki ngā kōrero a Nicolas Copernicus i roto i tana tuhinga, ko "D. Kāore te Ao i te noho ā-whare." I roto i āna mahi, i whakaputaina e Copernicus te whakaaro hou e kī ana kāore te whenua e noho ana i te pokapū o te ao nui, engari kei te huri haere i te rā, he whakaaro tēnei i rerekē ai ia i ngā tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā, i whakapono ai kāore te whenua e neke, ā, ko ia te pokapū o te ao nui.

Question:
Kimi $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
First, simplify the expression inside the problem:

\[
-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}}
\]

Start by simplifying \(-\dfrac{1}{-3}\):

\[
-\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}
\]

Next, simplify \(\cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}}\):

\[
\cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = -3
\]

Now, substitute these simplified values back into the original expression:

\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3)
\]

Multiply the two values:

\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = -1
\]

Thus, the value of the expression is \(\boxed{-1}\).

Question:

Question:
Kua whakatokatia ētahi o te wai o Mars i roto i te oneone, ā, ko ngā pūmatua hukapapa, ā, i ngaro ētahi nā te tīhore hau kōmaru, engari ko te nuinga o te wai taketake e whakaarotia ana kua ngaro i tētahi atu tikanga. He aha i pā ki tēnei wai "kotahi"?
A.I tangohia atu e te papa hautō i te tere o te hekenga o te kaha
B.I pakaru ki te hauwai me te hāora e te rama ultraviolet, ā, i ngaro te hauwai i roto i te putanga wera
C.i pau i te iwi o nga Tāngata matewai
D.I werohia i te wā o te puia kaha, a, ka ngaro ki te mokowā i roto i te mawhititanga wera
GivenAnswer:

Ko tēnei whakamārama e hāngai ana ki te ariā e mōhiotia whānuitia ana mō te ngaronga o te wai i runga i Mars. Nā te mea he iti te kaha o te kōhauhau o Mars ki te pupuri i ēnei ngota, kua rere te hauwai ki te wāhi, ā, kua ngaro atu i te aorangi.

Question:

Question:

B.He whakaeke e tārua tonu ana, e tirotiro ana mo te ngoikoretanga

Ka taea e tēnei te whakararu i te haumarutanga o te pūnaha mā te whakamahi i ngā raraunga tawhito, kāore i te mana, hei whakatutuki i ngā mahi kino.

Question:

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei ka kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā?
A.He tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori.
B.He nui ake nga reti o te pakeke.
C.He kararehe taka o nga taonga pūmatua.
D.Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena.
GivenAnswer: Ko te whakautu tika ko D. Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena. Ko te take, ko te penapena pūtea ka āwhina i te whakatipu o te ōhanga mā te tautoko i ngā haumi hou me te whakawhānui i ngā mahi pakihi. Mā te whakaiti i ngā tāke mō ngā moni penapena, ka akiaki te iwi ki te penapena atu, ka mutu, ka whakamahia ēnei pūtea penapena hei pūtea haumi mō ngā kaupapa whakawhanake pakihi, hanga hanganga, me ētahi atu kaupapa whai hua mō te ōhanga. Ko ēnei mahi haumi ka taea te whakapiki i te mahi, te hanga mahi, me te whakapai ake i te hua ohaoha o te motu.

Question:
Kai roto te kura i te āhua o te porotoru. Mēnā he rohe tapawhā 116 waewae tapawhā tō te pūtake tapatoru, ā, e 30 waewae te roa o te kura, e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Hei tātai i te rahinga o te wai ka taea e te kura te pupuri, me mātua mōhio tātou ki te rahinga o te kura. Kua kīia mai ko te āhua o te kura he porotoru, ā, ko te rohe o te pūtake tapatoru he 116 waewae tapawhā, ā, ko te roa o te kura he 30 waewae.

Ko te rahinga o te porotoru ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga:
\[ \text{Volume} = \text{Area of base} \times \text{Height} \]
i konei, ko te "Area of base" ko te rohe o te pūtake tapatoru, ā, ko te "Height" ko te roa o te kura.

Whakakīa ngā uara:
\[ \text{Volume} = 116 \text{ ft}^2 \times 30 \text{ ft} = 3480 \text{ ft}^3 \]

Nō reira, ko te whakautu ko:
C. 3480 ft^3

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.

Ko ngā whakaaro i whakapuakina i roto i te haerenga i runga ake i te tino whakaata ko tēhea o ngā āhuatanga e whai ake nei i roto i te hītori o U.S.?

Question:
Ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka e whakaaturia ana, e whakaaturia ana,
A.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me tōna wā o nāianei.
B.Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.
C.Ko te ōwehenga o tēnei wā ki tōna kōkuhutanga.
D.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko B. Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.

I roto i te pūtaiao hiko, ko te ture a Ohm e whakamārama ana i te hononga i waenga i te ngaohiko (V), te ātete (R), me te iahiko (I). E ai ki te ture a Ohm, ko te ngaohiko (V) ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te whārite:

\[ V = IR \]

I konei:
- \( V \) te ngaohiko, te rerekētanga o te pūngao hiko i waenga i ngā wāhi e rua i roto i te ara iahiko.
- \( I \) te iahiko, te rere o te hiko.
- \( R \) te ātete, te ārai ki te rere o te hiko.

Nō reira, mā te whakamārama i te whārite nei, ka kitea ko te ngaohiko he hua o te ātete me te iahiko. Heoi, ki te hiahia koe ki te tātai i te ātete mā te whakamahi i te ngaohiko me te iahiko, ka hurihia te whārite ki:

\[ R = \frac{V}{I} \]

Ko te tikanga, ko te ātete he ōwehenga o te ngaohiko ki te iahiko.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whakatau ana i te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga anō i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, he iti iho te tika i ngā manawa o te pānga i runga anō i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous?
A.Ngā irakētanga nui
B.Ngā tāruatanga ira
C.Ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira
D.Whakawhiti-atu
GivenAnswer:
Ko te pātai e pā ana ki te pānga o ngā momo rerekē i runga i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua me te raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous. Ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai ko:

C. Ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira

Ko ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira ka taea te huri i te raupapa o ngā waikawa amino i roto i te pūmua, nā te mea ka huri te tikanga o ngā codons i roto i te mRNA, ā, ka pā tēnei ki te hanga o te pūmua. Heoi, ko ngā irakētanga nui, ngā tāruatanga ira, me te whakawhiti-atu ka pā katoa ki te raupapa nucleotide, engari kāore pea e pā tika ki te raupapa waikawa amino pērā i te takahanga whakawhiti ira.

Question:
Ko te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki K-kōpaki ko te
A.rarangi i K
B.tapawhā i K
C.putoru i K
D.taurea i K
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakawāteatanga o te kupu "cross-validation K-fold" i te reo Māori, e pā ana ki te tikanga o te wehewehe raraunga ki ngā kōpaki maha (K ngā kōpaki) mō te whakamātautau me te whakangungu i te tauira tauhokohoko, pēnei i te tauira mātai raraunga. Ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai, i runga i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu:

D. taurea i K

Heoi, me mātua mōhio kāore tēnei kupu "taurea" i te whānui te whakamahia mō te "K-fold" i roto i ngā horopaki hangarau pēnei i te mātai raraunga. Ko te nuinga o te wā, ka whakamahia tonu te kupu Ingarihi "K-fold" ahakoa te reo e kōrerohia ana.

Question:
E pāngia ana e te tūroro he kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o nga vertebra.
A.Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.
B.Ka āhei anake rātau ki te hā mārire.
C.E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.
D.Ka kore e pāngia te mea nui.
GivenAnswer:
A te tūroro e pāngia ana e te kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o ngā vertebra, he maha ngā āhuatanga ka pā ki a rātau, ā, ka rerekē te pānga ki ia tangata. Ko te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi ka taea te pāpā kino ki ngā mahi a te tinana, tae atu ki te kaha ki te hā me te nekeneke. Ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai, i runga i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu:

C. E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.

He uaua te matapae i te pānga o te hā nā te mea ka rerekē te taumata o te whara me te wāhi o te wharanga ki te aho tuaiwi. Ka taea e tēnei momo wharanga te pā ki te kaha o te tangata ki te hā mārire, te whakahaere i ngā mahi a ngā whekau, me ētahi atu mahi a-tinana. Ko te tautoko ora me ngā tikanga whakaora ka hiahiatia pea hei āwhina i te tangata ki te ora me te whakahaere i ngā mahi o ia rā.

Question:
Tērā pea ka tukuna atu he tāke i whakaritea ki tētahi kaiwhakarato ki te kaihoko i te āhua o te utu mēnā ka nui ake te utu
A.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
B.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
C.Ko te tāwari utu o te tono he tāwariwari wae.
D.He tino tāwari te āhua o te tono.
GivenAnswer:
I te āhuatanga o tēnei pātai, he uaua ki te whakatau tika i te kōwhiringa pai rawa atu nā te mea kāore i te mārama te horopaki me te tikanga o ngā kōwhiringa e whakaratohia ana. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i te tikanga o te kupu "tāwari" i roto i te reo Māori, e pā ana ki te ngāwari, te māmā rānei o tētahi mea. 

Mēnā kei te kōrero mātou mō te utu o tētahi tono, ka taea e mātou te whakaaro ko te tikanga o ngā kōwhiringa A, B, me D he ōrite, arā, e kī ana katoa he ngāwari te utu o te tono. Ko te kōwhiringa C anake te rerekē, e kī ana ko te tāwari utu he tāwariwari wae, he kupu pea e tohu ana i te āhua rerekē o te ngāwari o te utu i ētahi wāhanga motuhake o te tono.

Ki te hiahia koe ki te whakautu i tēnei pātai, me mōhio koe ki te horopaki tonu o te pātai me ngā kōwhiringa. Heoi, i runga i te mōhiohio i hoatu, ko te kōwhiringa C te mea pea e whakaatu ana i tētahi āhuatanga motuhake e pā ana ki te utu.

Question:
Na te rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona, ko tēhea o ngā takirua UCS me te CS e whai ake nei te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako?
A.mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B.kai, kai, inu rānei
C.nekehanga me te tumeke
D.whiunga me nga utu
GivenAnswer:
I roto i ngā rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling, i kitea e rāua he hononga motuhake i waenga i te momo o te UCS (Unconditioned Stimulus) me te CS (Conditioned Stimulus) e pā ana ki te tere me te kaha o te ako. Ko tā rāua rangahau i aro nui ki te pānga o te "taste aversion," he momo ako e pā ana ki te kai me te inu.

Mai i ngā kōwhiringa kua rārangitia:

A. mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B. kai, kai, inu rānei
C. nekehanga me te tumeke
D. whiunga me nga utu

Ko te kōwhiringa B, arā, te "kai, kai, inu rānei" te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako i roto i ngā rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling. I roto i ā rāua mahi, i kitea e rāua he hononga kaha i waenga i te reka o te kai (he CS) me te pānga kino pēnei i te māuiui (he UCS). I tēnei horopaki, i tino tere te ako a ngā kararehe ki te karo i te kai i pāngia ai rātou ki te māuiui, ahakoa kotahi noa iho te wheako kino. Ko tēnei momo ako e mōhiotia ana ko te "taste aversion learning" ā, he tauira tino kaha tēnei o te ako pāhekoheko e hāngai ana ki te oranga o te tangata me ētahi atu kararehe.

Question:
Ka taea e te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o ngā phosphates pūngao tiketike, te ATP me te phosphocreatine, te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te:
A.1-2 hēkona.
B.5-10 hēkona.
C.30-40 hēkona.
D.50-60 hēkona.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te pūngao i whakaputaina mai i te wehenga o ngā phosphates pūngao tiketike, pērā i te ATP (adenosine triphosphate) me te phosphocreatine, ka taea te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te wā poto. Ko te ATP te puna pūngao matua mō ngā mahi poto me te kaha nui, pērā i te oma tere, te peke, rānei te hiki taumaha. Ka pau te ATP tere, engari ka taea te whakahoki mai mā te phosphocreatine, e tuku ana i tētahi puna pūngao tere mō te whakahou i te ATP.

Ko te wā e taea ai e tēnei pūnaha (ATP-phosphocreatine) te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi he poto noa, ā, e ai ki ngā rangahau, ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai ko:
B. 5-10 hēkona.

Heoi, i ētahi āhuatanga, ka taea e te pūnaha ATP-phosphocreatine te tautoko i te mahi mōrahi mō te wā roa ake, tae atu ki te 30 hēkona, engari ko te nuinga o ngā mahi mōrahi ka taea te tautoko mō te 5-10 hēkona.

Question:
Ko ngā Mutations e pā ana ki te pānga ka taea te whakawātea hei:
A.He tōraro kaha.
B.whai rawa.
C.Ko te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o
D.ngaronga-o-te-mahi.
GivenAnswer:
Ko ngā mutations e pā ana ki te pānga ka taea te whakawātea hei:

A. He tōraro kaha.
B. Whai rawa.
C. Ko te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o
D. Ngaronga-o-te-mahi.

I roto i te horopaki o te koiora, ko ngā mutations ka taea te whai pānga rerekē ki te mahi a te ira, te pūmua rānei e hāngai ana. Ko ēnei pānga ka taea te whakarōpūtia hei:

A. Gain-of-function (He tōraro kaha): He mutation e kaha ake ai te mahi a te ira, te pūmua rānei i tōna mahi taketake.
B. Gain-of-resource (Whai rawa): He mutation e taea ai te ira, te pūmua rānei te whakamahi rauemi hou, te whakaputa hua rerekē rānei.
C. Change-of-function (Ko te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o): He mutation e huri ai te mahi a te ira, te pūmua rānei ki tētahi mahi rerekē.
D. Loss-of-function (Ngaronga-o-te-mahi): He mutation e ngaro ai, e iti ake ai rānei te mahi a te ira, te pūmua rānei i tōna mahi taketake.

Ko ēnei momo mutations ka taea te whai pānga nui ki te oranga me te whanaketanga o te koiora.

Question:
Whakaritea te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, rongoā. (Ko te Ka for phenol ko te 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakatau i te ārohi o te H+(aq) i roto i te otinga o te phenol, me whakamahi tātou i te tātaitanga o te taurite waikawa:

\[ \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH} \rightleftharpoons \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^- + \text{H}^+ \]

Ko te tātaitanga mō te taurite waikawa (Ka) mō te phenol ko:
\[ K_a = \frac{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^-][\text{H}^+]}{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH}]} \]

Kua hoatu te Ka mō te phenol he 1 × 10^-10. I te mea ko te kukū o te phenol i te tīmatanga he 1.0 M, ka taea te whakaaro ko te nuinga o te phenol ka noho tonu hei C6H5OH i te mutunga o te taurite, nā te mea he iti rawa te Ka. Ko te tikanga, ka taea te whakaaro ko te kukū o te C6H5OH i te taurite he tata tonu ki te 1.0 M.

Mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga o te taurite:
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{x \times x}{1.0} \]
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = x^2 \]
\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]
\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

Ko te uara o x, ko te ārohi o te H+(aq), he 1 × 10^-5 M. Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:

D. 1 × 10^-5 M

Question:
Ko te mea ka nekehia te auautanga pōkākā o te pūmāota (DCl) mai i tērā o te hauwai hauwai (HCl) nā ngā rerekētanga o tō rātou
A.tuari irahiko
B.wā tou
C.tōpana taimau
D.iti iho te maha
GivenAnswer:
Ko te rerekētanga o te auautanga pōkākā i waenga i te pūmāota deuterium chloride (DCl) me te hydrogen chloride (HCl) ka hua mai i te rerekētanga o tō rāua **C. tōpana taimau**.

Hei whakamārama, ko te tōpana taimau (reduced mass) he mea nui ki te tātai i te auautanga o te wiri o ngā ngota i roto i te pūhui pēnei i te HCl me te DCl. Ko te tōpana taimau ka tātaihia mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga e whai ake nei:

\[ \mu = \frac{m_1 \times m_2}{m_1 + m_2} \]

i reira, \( m_1 \) me \( m_2 \) ngā papatipu o ngā ngota e rua i roto i te pūhui. Mō te HCl, ko \( m_1 \) te papatipu o te hauwai (H), ā, mō te DCl, ko \( m_1 \) te papatipu o te deuterium (D), he taumaha ake i te hauwai. Ko \( m_2 \) i ngā keehi e rua ko te papatipu o te chlorine (Cl).

Nā te mea he taumaha ake te deuterium i te hauwai, ka nui ake te tōpana taimau o te DCl i tērā o te HCl. Nā tēnei, ka iti ake te auautanga o te wiri mō te DCl i tērā o te HCl, nā te mea ko te auautanga o te wiri ka heke i te pikinga o te tōpana taimau.

Question:
He aha a Parfit e whakahē ana i te ōritetanga?
A.E tautohe ana a ia i te iwi taurite e kore e mōhiotia.
B.E kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.
C.E kī ana a ia ko tātau ia kawenga mo to tātau rawakore.
D.Ka whakakāhore katoa a ia i te ariā o te ōritetanga.
GivenAnswer:
Ko Derek Parfit, he kairangahau nō Ingarangi i te taha o te whakaaroaro me te tikanga, i tino tautohetohe mō ngā kaupapa pēnei i te ōritetanga, te tuakiri, me te tikanga o te pai. I roto i āna mahi, ka tautohe ia mō ngā momo huarahi ki te whakaaro mō te ōritetanga, engari kāore ia i whakakāhore katoa i te ariā o te ōritetanga. Hei tauira, i tana pukapuka "Reasons and Persons," ka tautohe ia mō te uara o te ōritetanga engari ka whakapae hoki i ngā raruraru o ētahi whakaaro ōritetanga pērā i te "Simple Equality" me te "Telic Egalitarianism."

Ko te whiringa tika rawa atu i runga i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu ko:

Ahakoa kāore tēnei kōrero e tino whakaatu i te hōhonutanga o ana tautohetohe, e whakaatu ana i tētahi wāhanga o tana whakaaro mō te pānga o te aro ki te hunga rawakore ki te whakapai ake i te ōritetanga i roto i te hapori.

Question:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua
A.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 4
B.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3
C.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 1
D.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tōtika quantum (quantum efficiency) o tētahi pūoko whakaahua e tohu ana i te ōrau o ngā pūngao marama (photons) ka hurihia hei hiko, arā, hei tohu mō te kaha o te pūoko ki te hopu i ngā photons ka tukuna ki roto. Mēnā ko te tōtika quantum he 0.1, arā, 10% o ngā photons ka hurihia hei hiko.

Mēnā ka tukuna 100 ngā photons ki roto i te pūoko, ka taea e te pūoko te hopu i te 10% o ēnei, arā, 10 photons. Heoi, nā te mea he tukanga tupurangi te hopu photons, ka puta he auau (variance) i roto i te maha o ngā photons ka hopukina i ia wā.

Ka taea te whakamahi i te ture binomial hei tātai i te toharite me te whakataka (variance) mō te maha o ngā photons ka hopukina. Mō te ture binomial, ko te toharite \( np \) me te whakataka \( np(1-p) \), ki hea \( n \) ko te tapeke o ngā nganatanga (i tēnei take, 100 photons) me \( p \) ko te tōtika quantum (0.1).

Ko te toharite:
\[ np = 100 \times 0.1 = 10 \]

Ko te whakataka:
\[ np(1-p) = 100 \times 0.1 \times (1 - 0.1) = 100 \times 0.1 \times 0.9 = 9 \]

Ko te pakiaka tapawhā o te whakataka (root mean square deviation, rms) ka taea te tātai mā te tango i te pakiaka tapawhā o te whakataka:
\[ \text{rms} = \sqrt{9} = 3 \]

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
B. e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā huinga moka e whai ake nei ka TAEA te whakaahua ki tētahi kīanga auau?
A.Ko ngā aho moka katoa, ko tōna maha o ngā kore he maha o ngā kore e rima
B.Ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi
C.Ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore
D.Ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore
GivenAnswer:

Question:
I roto i te xy-plane, ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x ko
A.te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B.he ānau kati
C.he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
D.he ira kotahi
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakaoti i tēnei pātai, me mātua mārama tātou ki te āhua o te kauwhata o te whārite \(x^{\log y} = y^{\log x}\) i roto i te xy-plane.

Tuatahi, kia mātua mārama tātou ki te whārite:
\[ x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \]

Ka taea te whakarerekē i tēnei whārite mā te whakamahi i ngā ture o ngā logarithms:
\[ \log y \cdot \log x = \log x \cdot \log y \]

Ka kitea he pono tēnei whārite mō ngā uara katoa o \(x\) me \(y\) e kore e taea te tātai i te log o te kore, arā, mō ngā \(x > 0\) me \(y > 0\). Heoi, me mātua mārama anō hoki tātou ki te āhua o te kauwhata.

Kia tirohia te āhua o te kauwhata mā te whakamahi i ngā uara motuhake:
1. Mēnā \(x = y\), ka kitea:
   \[ x^{\log x} = x^{\log x} \]
   He pono tēnei, nō reira, ko te rārangi \(y = x\) kei roto i te kauwhata.

2. Mēnā ka whakamātauhia te whārite mō ngā uara rerekē o \(x\) me \(y\) e kore e ōrite, ka kitea he uaua ki te whakatau i te whārite mā te tātai noa. Heoi, mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga rorohiko, ka kitea ko te kauwhata he rārangi tika \(y = x\) anake.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai ko:
D. he ira kotahi (ko te rārangi \(y = x\) anake kei roto i te kauwhata).

Question:

Question:
E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals

GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Heoi anō, kāore i tino mārama te pātai i tukuna mai. Heoi, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā kōwhiringa e whā e pā ana ki ngā residuals i roto i te tātaritanga raraunga:

A. He tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals - Mēnā kei te kitea he tauira cyclical i roto i ngā residuals, arā, he auau te huringa o ngā uara i runga i te wā, tērā pea kāore i tino tika te tauira matua ki te hopu i ngā āhuatanga katoa o te raraunga, pērā i te wāhanga wā.

B. He tauira whakarerekē i roto i nga residuals - Mēnā kei te kitea he tauira whakarerekē i roto i ngā residuals, arā, he rerekē te horapa o ngā residuals i te roanga o te wā, tērā pea he raru o te homoscedasticity, arā, kāore ngā residuals e tohatoha ōrite ana i te katoa.

D. Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore - Mēnā e tata ana ngā residuals ki te kore, arā, he iti rawa ngā rerekētanga i waenga i ngā uara tūturu me ngā uara i matapaetia e te tauira, he tohu tēnei kua tino pai te tauira ki te whakatauira i te raraunga.

Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te mōhio ko tēhea o ēnei kōwhiringa e tika ana mō tētahi āhuatanga motuhake, me whakamārama mai i te horopaki o te pātai.

Question:
Tauākī 1 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Tauākī 2 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Pono, Pono
B.Teka, teka
C.Pono, False
D.Pono
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakamārama i ngā tauākī e rua, me mātua mārama ki ngā ture o te tātai rōpū (group theory).

**Tauākī 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}**

I roto i tētahi rōpū, ko te tikanga o te whakamuri i tētahi huinga ko te whakamuri i ia mema o taua huinga, engari me whakarerekē te raupapa. Mō te tauira, (ab)^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}. Mā te whakamahi i tēnei ture, ka taea te kī:

(ab)^{-2} = (ab)^{-1}(ab)^{-1} = (b^{-1}a^{-1})(b^{-1}a^{-1}) = b^{-1}(a^{-1}b^{-1})a^{-1}.

Ki te kore a me b e komuti (arā, ab ≠ ba), kāore e taea te whakarite i ngā mema o roto i te huinga kia rite ki b^{-2}a^{-2}. Nō reira, ko te tauākī tuatahi he pono anake mēnā a me b e komuti ana (ab = ba). I roto i te horopaki whānui o ngā rōpū, kāore tēnei tauākī e tika ana.

**Tauākī 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n**

He rite anō te take mō tēnei tauākī. Ko te whakatairite (ab)^n = a^nb^n e tika ana anake mēnā a me b e komuti ana. I roto i te horopaki whānui, kāore tēnei tauākī e tika ana mēnā kāore a me b e komuti.

**Whakautu:**

Ko te whakautu tika, i runga i te horopaki whānui o ngā rōpū, ko:
B. Teka, teka

Ko ngā tauākī e rua he pono anake mēnā a me b e komuti ana, engari kāore i te pono i roto i ngā rōpū katoa.

Question:
Kimihia te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te y = 1/2 me te y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Hei kimi i te roanga o te ānau o te rārangi \( y = \ln x \) i waenga i ngā pūwāhi e rua, arā, i waenga i ngā uara \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) me \( y = 1 \), me whakamahi tātou i te tātaitanga o te roanga o te ānau.

Ko te tātaitanga o te roanga o te ānau mō te mahi \( y = f(x) \) i waenga i ngā pūwāhi \( x = a \) me \( x = b \) ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga e whai ake nei:
\[
L = \int_a^b \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{dy}{dx}\right)^2} \, dx
\]

I tēnei take, \( y = \ln x \), nō reira:
\[
\frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{d}{dx} \ln x = \frac{1}{x}
\]

Whakakīa tēnei ki te tātaitanga o te roanga:
\[
L = \int_a^b \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^2} \, dx = \int_a^b \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]

Ināianei, me kimi i ngā uara o \( a \) me \( b \) mā te whakamahi i ngā uara o \( y \):
- \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) ka hua \( \ln x = \frac{1}{2} \), nō reira \( x = e^{1/2} = \sqrt{e} \)
- \( y = 1 \) ka hua \( \ln x = 1 \), nō reira \( x = e^1 = e \)

Nō reira, \( a = \sqrt{e} \) me \( b = e \). Whakaurua ēnei ki te tātaitanga:
\[
L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^e \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]

Ka taea te whakamahi i te tātaitanga tika, pēnei i te whakamahi i te rorohiko, ki te tātai i tēnei tātaitanga. Ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei tātaitanga, i runga i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu, ko:
B. 0.86

Ko tēnei te roanga o te ānau o te rārangi \( y = \ln x \) i waenga i \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) me \( y = 1 \).

Question:
Mā te tere tuatahi o te 1.5 × te 10^6 m/s, ka tomo tētahi proton ki tētahi rohe o te āpure hautō taimau 1.5 T. Mēnā ka hangaia e te tere tuatahi o te proton tētahi koki o te 30° me te āpure hautō, ka whakararuraru i te tere o te 4 o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakatau i tēnei pātai, me mārama tātou ki ngā ture o te nekehanga o ngā korakora utaina i roto i te āpure hautō. Ka uru ana tētahi proton ki roto i tētahi āpure hautō, ka pāngia e te kaha Lorentz, he kaha e whakawhirinaki ana ki te utu o te korakora, tōna tere, me te kaha o te āpure hautō. Ko te hua o tēnei kaha ko te nekehanga porotītaha o te proton.

I tēnei take, ko te tere tuatahi o te proton he 1.5 × 10^6 m/s, ā, ko te koki i waenganui i te tere me te āpure hautō he 30°. Ko te āhua o te nekehanga o te proton ka porotītaha, ā, ka noho tonu te rahinga o tōna tere i te wā e neke ana i roto i te āpure hautō.

Ko te tere o te proton i te ahunga tika ki te āpure hautō ka pāngia e te kaha Lorentz, engari ko te wāhanga o te tere e tika ana ki te āpure hautō (te tere tītaha) ka noho pūmau. Ko te tere tītaha ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te trigonometry:

\[ v_{\text{tītaha}} = v \cos(\theta) \]
\[ v_{\text{tītaha}} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \cos(30^\circ) \]
\[ v_{\text{tītaha}} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times 0.866 \]
\[ v_{\text{tītaha}} \approx 1.3 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

Ko te tere tītaha ka noho pūmau, ā, ko te tere katoa o te proton ka noho tonu hoki i te mea kāore he kaha e mahi ana i te ahunga o te tere. Nā reira, ko te tere o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō ka noho tonu ki te:

\[ v = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s

Question:
Kai roto te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu. Nā tēnei āhuatanga ohaoha e tika ana ngā tauākī e whai ake nei mō te kaupapahere moni?

Question:

GivenAnswer:

I roto i te glycolysis, ka pakaru te glucose ki ngā pyruvate e rua. Heoi, ko te pyruvate tonu te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i mua i ētahi atu tukanga pērā i te fermentation.

Question:

I te Tauari 2, he hē te mahi a te pūāhua matua, arā, te ringihanga o te ārai ki roto i te horoi kī tonu i ngā kākahu o tana hoa noho. He mahi tēnei e takahi ana i te manaakitanga me te whakaute ki te tangata nōna ngā kākahu, ā, he hē tēnei mahi e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho.

Question:

I te tauari tuarua, "I kihi ahau i taku kōtiro i te whakaaturanga manawa" e tohu ana i tētahi mahi ka taea te whakaaro he takahi i ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho mō te whanonga tika i te iwi whānui, inā koa i roto i te horopaki o te whakaaturanga manawa, he wāhi tūmatanui pea.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana ki te tinihanga?
A.Ngaronga taumaha
B.Myxoedema tōmua
C.He taumata TSH i whakaarahia
D.He hurihanga ki ngā wāhi mahana
GivenAnswer:
C. He taumata TSH i whakaarahia

I roto i te horopaki o te tinihanga, ko te taumata TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone) i whakaarahia he tohu mārama mō te hypothyroidism, arā, he āhua kaore i te pai te mahi a te thyroid. Ko te TSH he hormone e whakaputaina ana e te pituitary gland hei whakahaere i te mahi a te thyroid gland. Mēnā he teitei te taumata o te TSH, e tohu ana tēnei kua ngana te pituitary gland ki te whakakaha i te thyroid gland kia mahi pai ake, nā te mea kāore te thyroid e whakaputa ana i ngā hormone thyroid e tika ana.

Question:
Hei whakahauhau i te whakaurunga kāreti, ka tukua e tētahi āhua he waihotanga tāke e $200 mō ngā tāke ā rohe mō te hunga he tauira wā katoa i ngā kura i roto i te kāwanatanga. E whakaaetia tonutia ana ngā ākonga wahine e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā ki tētahi waihotanga tāke $100, ā, kua kore ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā e whakaaetia he waihotanga tāke. Ko tēhea o ēnei e tino whakarāpopoto ana i te ture tika o te ture ā-ture e pā ana ki te waihotanga tāke ā rohe mō ngā ākonga e whakauru ana i te hāwhe wā?
A.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei whakakāhoretanga i te tukanga tika.
B.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.
C.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te rohe o te tukanga tika nui.
D.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te mana o te whenua ki te tāke i nga wāhanga rerekē o te tangata.
GivenAnswer:
B. Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.

I tēnei horopaki, e kitea ana he rerekētanga i waenga i ngā ākonga wahine me ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā, ā, ko ngā ākonga wahine anake e whakaaetia ana ki te waihotanga tāke $100. Ko tēnei rerekētanga ka taea te tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite, e kī ana kia kaua e whakawehewehea te tangata i runga i te ira tangata, iwi, rānei ētahi atu āhuatanga pērā i te taumata mātauranga.

Question:
I whakaaturia e ngā mātauranga ki te rauropi o Schizophrenia tētahi āhuatanga iranga ki te āhuatanga, engari kei roto ētahi atu take. Mai i tō mōhiotanga ki te kaupapa e mōhio ana ko tēhea o ngā tauākī e whai ake nei e hē ana.
A.Tērā pea he āhuatanga kaitāpae te mahi mahi, te tairongotanga rānei ki te mahi.
B.He tohu kē atu nga tūroro mā.
C.Ko te whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru ko te 65%.
D.He iti iho te mokatere o Schizophrenia i kitea i waenganui i ngā Kaiāwhina o Āwherika.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tauākī e hē ana i roto i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu ko:
C. Ko te whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru ko te 65%.

He hē tēnei tauākī nā te mea kāore he raraunga pūtaiao e tautoko ana i tēnei ōrau motuhake mō te "whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru." He uaua te whakamārama i tēnei tauākī me te kore e mōhio ki te horopaki tika, ā, kāore i te mārama te tikanga o te "whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te Ao Tuatoru" i roto i te horopaki o te schizophrenia. Ko te nuinga o ngā rangahau e aro ana ki ngā āhuatanga iranga, taiao, me ngā take hinengaro e pā ana ki te schizophrenia, kāore i te aro nui ki ngā ōrau pēnei i te tauākī nei.

Question:
E ai ki a Nussbaum, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa
A.He rawaka mo te ahanoa tōkai.
B.e hiahiatia ana mō te ahanoa tōkai.
C.kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai.
D.ko ngā mea katoa o runga.
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki a Martha Nussbaum, he kairangahau nui i roto i te mara o te tika tangata me te kaupapa here tōrangapū, ko te tiaki i tētahi tangata hei ahanoa:

C. kāore i te tika mō te ahanoa tōkai.

E ai ki ngā whakaaro o Nussbaum, me whai mana te tangata ki te whai oranga tōtika me te whai wāhi ki ngā tūmomo āhuatanga o te ora e tika ana mō te whakapuaki i ō rātou pūmanawa. Ko te whakaiti i te tangata hei mea noa iho, hei ahanoa mō te whakamahi, e kore e taea te tautoko i roto i tētahi hapori e whai ana kia tika, kia haumaru hoki mō ōna tāngata katoa.

Question:
Kātahi anō ka whakatuwhera anō te hokomaha i muri i te katinga o te rua wiki mo nga whakatikatikatanga. I te ata o te whakatuwhera anō, ka hokohoko tētahi wahine i tana takanga ohorere, a, ka pā ki te waewae pakaru. I muri iho, ka whiua e te wahine te hokomaha mo nga mate whaiaro. I roto i tōna hūtu, ka kī te wahine kua haere a ia ki runga i tētahi pākete peita e takoto ana i roto i tētahi o nga ara. I te whakawātanga, ka karangatia e te wahine tētahi atu kiritaki hai whakaatu, i a ia e hokohoko ana, ka rongo a ia i te thud, ka huri, ka kite i te wahine e taka ana i runga i te papa. I whakaaturia hoki e ia i kite a ia i tētahi pākete peita wātea e takoto ana i ētahi waewae ruarua i te waewae o te wahine. I runga i te whakamātautau whakawhiti, ka uru te kiritaki ki tētahi whakawhitinga tautohe ki te rōia o te hokomaha. No te pātaitanga ki tōna whakaaro he aha te take o te hinganga o te wahine, ka whakaaturia e te kiritaki, "I hinga a ia nā te mea i haere a ia ki runga i te pākete. " Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki te whakamātautau whakawhiti, kaore tonu a ia i kite i te haerenga o te wahine i runga i te pākete. Kātahi ka pātai atu te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki i te pātai e whai ake nei:"Ki te kore koe e kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea koe e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira?" Ka whakautua e te kiritaki, "Nā te mea i kōrero mai taku kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana me au ā muri ake ka kite a ia i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete. " Ka neke te rōia o te hokomaha ki te tuki i te whakautu whakamutunga a te kiritaki. Ki te whakakorea e te kaiwhakawā whakawā te mōtini a te tangata whakapae, ā, ka whakaaetia te whakautu a te kiritaki kia tū, tērā pea nā te mea
A.I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.
B.I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.
C.Ko te whakautu a te kiritaki he kōrero mo te whakaaro o mua tata nei.
D.He ariā mōhio te whakautu a te kiritaki i tēnei wā.
GivenAnswer:
A. I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.

I tēnei horopaki, i pātai te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki me pēhea ia i mōhio ai kua hinga te wahine nā te pākete, ā, nā tēnei pātai i āhei ai te kiritaki ki te whakamārama i tōna mōhio mā te kōrero a tētahi atu tangata (tana kōtiro) i kite i te hinganga. Nā te mea i pātaihia e te rōia tēnei pātai, ka taea te kī i pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia, ā, koia te take ka taea te whakaae ki te whakautu a te kiritaki ahakoa he kōrero tuarua tēnei.

Question:
Ko te kaitono tuhituhi he Mehikihi-Amerika, ā, ko te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana e ia he whiringa nui o nga kaipōti o Mehikihi kia whiwhi ai i te pōti. Ko te hua, ko tana kaiwhakahaere whakahau, ka whakatau kia mēra ki ia kaipōti o Mehikihi kua rēhitatia he whakapiripiri roimata, e mau ana i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono e whakahaere ana a ia. I te mea he tokomaha nga tāngata māori o Mehikihi kāore i te mōhio ki te pānui me te tuhituhi Ingarihi, e whakapono ana te kaiwhakahaere whakahau he uaua ki te tokomaha o nga kaipōti te tuhi i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono i runga i te pōti. Ko te hua, kua whakatūria e te kaiwhakahaere whakahau tētahi whakahau pāpāho whānui hei whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaipōti me pēhea te hoatu i ngā whakapiri ki te pōti. E rima marama i mua i te pōti ka whakamōhiotia e tētahi mana pōti te komiti whakahau a te kaitono kāore nga whakapiri roimata e ū ana ki te tikanga o te kāwanatanga. I roto i tana reta, ka whakamārama te mana ko nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga, he whakaaro tērā e hiahiatia ana e nga kaipōti tūpono ki te tuhi waituhi i te ingoa o te kaitono. Na reira, ka whakamutua e ia kaore nga whakapiripiri e ū ana ki nga whakaritenga ā-ture. E toru wiki i muri iho, ka whakaputaina e te kaitono te hūtu i te kōti o te rohe o te kāwanatanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ko to rātau whakamāramatanga o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga e takahi ana i te Kaupapa Ture o U. S. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei, mēnā ka whakatūria, ka whakaritea te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga?
A.Neke atu i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti i waenganui i ngā kaipōti o Amerika i rēhitatia, kāore i te iti iho i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti.
B.E hiahiatia ana e tētahi tikanga kāwanatanga kia whakarahia ia wāhi pōti ki tētahi pene waituhi hei whakangāwari i te tuhituhi i roto i ngā pōti.
C.Nā te nuinga o ngā pōti tuhi-mai e whakanui ake ana i te wā e hiahiatia ana hei tatau i ngā pōti katoa, me maka aua pōti i runga i te āhua ōrite.
D.He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga ka kitea i te kōwhiringa D: He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.

Ko tēnei kōwhiringa e whakaatu ana i te take tika mō te mana pōti ki te ārai i te whakamahinga o ngā whakapiripiri roimata i runga i ngā pōti. Mā te whakaputa i te āwangawanga mō te tinihanga pōti, ka taea e te mana pōti te whakamārama he aha i kore ai e taea te whakaae ki ngā whakapiripiri hei tikanga whaimana mō te tāpae i ngā ingoa o ngā kaitono. Ko te tinihanga pōti he take nui e pā ana ki te pono me te haumaru o ngā pōtitanga, ā, mā te aukati i ngā tikanga pēnei i te whakamahi i ngā whakapiripiri, ka āwhina tēnei ki te tiaki i te tukanga pōti kia noho haumaru, tika, me te pono.

Question:
I tino whara tētahi atu atekōkiri i te taraiwa o te mīhini mīhini. I whakamātauria te mīhini mo te haere i te ara hē, a, ka utua he pai. He tepenga kaupapahere tā te kaihoko, e $15,000 anake mo te taunaha a te hunga tuatoru i runga i tana kaupapa inihua. I muri i te whakarato i te kaihautū o te mīhini ki tētahi pūrongo rongoā katoa, ngā pire rongoā katoa, ngā pūkete rongoā, me ētahi atu tohu tūkino e hiahiatia ana, ka tonoa e te kaituku whara ngā tepe kaupapahere. Ka kitea e te kaitohutohu ka whakaputaina he take whakapono kino mehemea kaore nga tepe kaupapahere i utua ināianei tonu. Kaore te kamupene inihua i whakakāhore i te utunga, kaore he whakamāramatanga. I whakawhiwhia e te hūri te take whara e $200,000. I whiwhi te kaituku i whara i tētahi whakaritenga i hainatia mai i te mīhini mīhini e hoatu ana ki te kaituku i ngā mana tērā pea i a ia e whawhai ana te mīhini ki tana kaihoko. Tērā pea ka whakahaua e te kōti te kamupene inihua kia utua te nuinga katoa o te whakataunga hūri ki te tangata whara i raro i ēnei take?
A.Ko te tepe kaupapahere ko te $15,000, ā, ko ngā mea katoa e taea te kohikohi e te tangata whara, kāore he mahi mō te whakapono kino ki tētahi kirimana inihua.
B.I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.
C.He whaiaro te whakapono kino ki te rōpū tūturu, ā, he muhu tana mahi, ā, kaore he take a te tangata whara ki te whakahau i te kaihoko kia utu.
D.Me whakaū e te rōpū whara tana whakawa katoa ki te mīhini, ā, e kore pea e whai i te kaihautū mo taua moni.
GivenAnswer:
B. I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.

I tēnei āhuatanga, ko te kawenga o te kamupene inihua ki te whakatutuki i ōna herenga i raro i te kirimana inihua me te ture e pā ana ki te whakapono pai me te mahi tika. Mēnā kua kitea e te kōti he takahi i tēnei kawenga, pērā i te kore e utu i ngā kerēme tika ahakoa kua whakaratohia ngā tohu tūkino e tika ana, ka taea e te kōti te whakahau i te kamupene inihua kia utu i te nui katoa o te whakataunga hūri, ahakoa te tepe kaupapahere o te $15,000. Ko tēnei momo whakatau ka whai wāhi ki te whakarite kia kaua e whakamahia e ngā kamupene inihua ō rātou mana ki te tāmi i te tika o ngā kaiwhiwhi kerēme.

Question:
Te iwi o Nubian:
A.I whakaritea, a, ka whakahīhī i te pikinga o te ahurea o Ihipiana.
B.Ko te hua o te whakawāteatanga o Mesopotamian i te tonga.
C.I hangaia hei urupare, engari kaore i roto i te whakaputa i te ahurea o Ihipiana.
D.Kaore he hoapā ki nga tikanga noho tata.
GivenAnswer:
A.I whakaritea, a, ka whakahīhī i te pikinga o te ahurea o Ihipiana.

Te iwi o Nubian, e mōhiotia ana mō tō rātou ahurea motuhake me tō rātou mana motuhake, i whai pānga nui ki te ahurea o Ihipiana, ā, i whai hoki te ahurea o Ihipiana i a rātou. I roto i ngā wā o mua, i maha ngā wā i pāhekoheko ai ngā iwi e rua nei, ā, i ētahi wā i raro i te mana o Ihipiana a Nubia, i ētahi atu wā i raro i te mana o Nubia a Ihipiana. Heoi, ahakoa ngā pānga o waho, i pupuri tonu a Nubia i tōna ahurea motuhake me ōna tikanga.

Question:
I whiwhi nga pirihimana i tētahi aki mai i tētahi kaitiaki pono kai te mahi te tangata i te rongoā i tōna kāinga. Kātahi ka tukuna atu e nga āpiha ki te kaiwhakawā he oati tautohe e whakaatu ana i te take tūpono mo te whakaputa i tētahi whakamana rapu. Ka tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he whakamana rapu mo nga rongoā rongoā i te wāhitau o te tangata. Ka haere nga āpiha pirihimana ki te kāinga o taua tangata, a, ka tangi i te pere tatau. No te korenga o tētahi tangata e whakautu, ka pakaru nga pirihimana, a, ka tomo ki te nohoanga. I rapua e rātau nga rūma i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, kaore i kitea he whakaaturanga whakararuraru, kātahi ka haere ki waho, a, ka kite i tētahi tomokanga motuhake e ahu ana ki te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka piki atu rātau ki te huarahi, a, ka tomo ki roto i te rūma moe. I roto i te rūma ka kitea e nga āpiha he rehu o te hīkaka e takoto ana i runga i te kākahu. I a rātau e haere tonu ana nga āpiha ki te rapu i te rūma moe, ka tomo te tangata whakapae ki te rūma. Ka pātai atu nga pirihimana ki te tangata whakapae mehemea ko ia te tangata. Ka kitea e te tangata whakapae a ia, a, ka kī atu ki nga pirihimana kai roto rātau i tōna rūma moe, a, ka nohoia e ia te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka whakamātauria e te tangata whakapae e noho ana te tangata i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, i wehea ōna wāhi ora i te hunga whakapae. Ahakoa rā, i whakatakotoria te tangata whakapae ki raro i te hopu, a, ka whakahaua ki te pupuri i te rongoā. Kua whakaputaina e te tangata whakapae he mōtini hai aukati i te hīkaka kia kore ai e whakaaetia ki te whakaaturanga. Ko te tikanga ko te mōtini a te tangata whakapae ko
A.I tukuna, no te mea kaore te whakamana i whakaingoa i te hunga whakapae.
B.I tukuna, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.
C.Ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.
D.I whakakāhore, nā te mea he tika te whakamana, a, ka tukuna atu he take tūpono.
GivenAnswer:
C. Ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.

I tēnei āhuatanga, ahakoa i kī te tangata whakapae kāore ia i te noho i te papa tuatahi o te whare, engari i te papa tuarua, i whakapono tika ngā pirihimana i te wā i tomo ai rātau ki te whare e ai ki te whakamana rapu, e rapu ana rātau i te wāhi tika. Ko te whakamana rapu i tukuna e te kaiwhakawā i whakaae kia rapua te wāhitau katoa, ā, i te mea kāore he tohu mārama i te wā i tomo ai ngā pirihimana e tohu ana kāore rātau e tika ana ki te rapu i te papa tuarua, ka taea te kī i mahi tika ngā pirihimana i raro i te mana o te whakamana rapu.

Question:
Kei tēnei mana whakahaere te tikanga hara e whai ake nei:"Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. " I tētahi ahiahi, he pēpi te tangata whakapae i tana irāmutu e rima tau. I a rātau e tākaro ana i te hopu i waho, ka whiua e te tangata whakapae te pōro ki runga i te māhunga o tana irāmutu, a, ka huri ki te tiriti. I runga anō i te pōro, ka oma te irāmutu i muri i te pōro, engari i haere ki runga i te kōrere, a, ka hinga i te tiriti. No tana haerenga, ka tino rere te irāmutu i tōna raparapa, a, kaore i taea te tū ake. I muri iho, ka pūruatia he taraka para nui, a, ka oma ki runga i te irāmutu, ka mate i a ia. Ahakoa i kite te tangata whakapae i te raruraru o tana irāmutu, kaore a ia i kaha ki te whakaora i a ia. Nō muri iho, ka whakataua te tangata whakapae ki te tangata hara. I te whakawātanga, ka whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere a ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, a, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. I muri i te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tohunga mo te whakangungu i te āhua o te āhua i whakaahuatia e te hunga whakapae, ehara i te rerekē ina puta he takahanga mōrearea. Ki te whakapono te hūri ki te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga, ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te hunga whakapae?
A.I te mate te tangata whakapae i te tapu rangitahi.
B.Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.
C.Ehara i te mea noa iho te rahunga o te tangata whakapae ki te mahi.
D.Na tērā o te atekōkiri taraka i whakararuraru te taunaha hara a te tangata whakapae.
GivenAnswer:
B. Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.

I tēnei āhuatanga, e whakaatu ana te whakamārama a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga i te āhua o te ohorere nui i pā ki a ia i te wā i kite ai ia i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para. Mēnā ka whakapono te hūri ki tēnei whakaaturanga, ka taea te kī kāore i te tika te whakapae i te tangata whakapae mō te kore e āhei ki te ārai i te aituā, nā te mea kāore i a ia te āhua hinengaro tika i taua wā motuhake hei whakahaere i tētahi mahi whakaora. Ka taea te whakamārama i tēnei āhuatanga hei "tapu rangitahi" nā te ohorere nui, engari ko te kōwhiringa B e tika ana i konei nā te mea e pā ana ki te āhua hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mō te kōmihana o te hara, kāore i te tapu rangitahi anake.

Question:
He kaha whenua to te kaporeihana whare. I whakaritea e te kaporeihana whare he mahere whanaketanga hai wehe i te whenua ki te 100 rota, a, ka waihanga i tētahi iwi noho i runga i te kaha. I hangaia e te Whakapuakitanga o Covenants te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga, he hinonga whakahaere e whakahaere ana, e whakaū ana i ngā ture me ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea i waenganui i nga kawenata. Ka pānuitia tētahi o ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Covenants:"E kore rawa e whakatūria, e whakaaetia, e whakaaetia ana rānei, ka pupuri rānei i tētahi wāhanga o te āhuatanga i hangaia, i whakamahia rānei hei saloon, he wāhi rānei mō te hoko, te waihanga rānei o te malt, te tinihanga, te waipiro wairua rānei. " I whakapūketetia te Whakapuakitanga o Covenants, ā, i whakaurua ki roto i te mahi i tangohia e te kaiako i tana hokonga i te 62 nui i roto i te whanaketanga. I wawe tonu te tāhopu a te kaiako i tana mahi. I rīhitia e te kaiako tōna kāinga ki te kararehe mo te wā kotahi tau. I roto i te rīhi nga rāhuitanga ōrite ki ērā i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o nga Covenants, i roto hoki i te mahi a te kaiako. I wawe tonu te tīmata o te kaitiaki ki te hoko waipiro i runga i nga kāinga i roto i nga rōpū "i muri iho" i ia wiki. Ko te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga e whakahau ana i te taupoki i roto i tētahi mahi mo nga tūkinotanga. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te tautohe tino pai mo te librarian?
A.Ko te ture i roto i te Kēhi o Perehitini e ārai ana i te āheitanga o te kaitiaki.
B.Kaore te kaitiaki i te whakawātea i te kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga.
C.Kaore te kaitiaki o te kararehe i te whakawātea i te pānga ki te kaiako.
D.Ko ētahi atu rota i te āhua tata nei e whakamahia ana mo nga take arumoni.
GivenAnswer:
C. Kaore te kaitiaki o te kararehe i te whakawātea i te pānga ki te kaiako.

I tēnei take, ko te tautohe tino pai mō te kaitiaki ko te korenga o te kaitiaki o te kararehe i te whakawātea i te pānga ki te kaiako. I rīhitia e te kaiako tōna kāinga ki te kararehe me ngā rāhuitanga ōrite ki ērā i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Covenants, ā, i whakaurua hoki ēnei rāhuitanga ki roto i te mahi a te kaiako. Nā reira, ko te mahi a te kaitiaki ki te hoko waipiro i runga i te kāinga he takahi i ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea, ā, kāore i te whakawātea i te pānga ki te kaiako nā te mea kua takahia e ia ngā tikanga o te rīhi me te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Covenants.

Question:
Ka kitea e te kaimahi o te umanga whakanao nui te mahi, a, ka whai i te mahi mo te moni anake. He iti noa iho te mahi a te kaimahi, ā, kāore i te tino whakahauhautia kia tino nui rawa, kia pai ake rānei te kounga. E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a F. Herzberg, ko te huarahi pai rawa atu o te 10 e whakanui ake ana i te whakahauhau a tēnei kaimahi, ko te tikanga kia
A.tukuna he utu whakarewa me te tohutohu mō te hua nui ake
B.hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi
C.whakanui ake i ngā huarahi mō te tauwhitinga pāpori mōhiotia
D.whakarato tai mahi ki te kaimahi e mau ana i te mana nui ake
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a F. Herzberg, e rua ngā momo āhuatanga e pā ana ki te mahi: ko ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake (motivators) me ngā āhuatanga tiaki (hygiene factors). Ko ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake pērā i te whai wāhitanga ki te mahi auaha, te whai wāhi ki te whakatau kaupapa, me te whai mana ki te mahi, ka taea te whakapiki i te whakahauhau o te kaimahi. Ko ngā āhuatanga tiaki pērā i te utu, te haumaru mahi, me ngā tikanga mahi, he mea nui ki te kore e puta te korekore o te kaimahi, engari kāore e tino whakapiki i te whakahauhau.

I tēnei horopaki, ko te kōwhiringa B, "hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi," te mea tino tika. Mā te hoahoa anō i te mahi kia uaua ake, kia whai wero, kia whai kiko hoki, ka taea te whakapiki i te whakahauhau o te kaimahi mā te whakarato i ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake pērā i te whai wāhitanga ki te mahi auaha me te whai mana ki te mahi. Ka āwhina tēnei i te kaimahi ki te kite i te uara o tāna mahi me te whai wāhi ki te whakapai ake i tōna mahi me te kounga o te hua.

Question:
I tēnei wā ko te kaihautū te rangatira o te pūkete o tētahi mōkihi whenua i tohua hei "A. "Ko te teitei ake o ngā āhuatanga noho tata e rua i runga i te maunga. Ko te kaiahuwhenua te rangatira o te mōkihi "B," e iti iho ana i te "A" i runga i te maunga. I te tau 2000, i hangaia e te kaihautū, nāna ngā mōkihi whenua e rua, he pūnaha wai tūmataiti. Ko tēnei pūnaha ko tētahi ararere o raro, i whakaroa puta noa i nga mōkihi whenua e rua. I rere mai te paraka mai i te mōkihi "A" i roto i te pūnaha ki tētahi pūwhenua, i raro o te maunga. I te tau 2005, ka hokona e te kaihautū te mōkihi "B" ki te kaiahuwhenua. Kaore i roto i te deed ki te kaiahuwhenua tētahi kōrero o te pūnaha wai o te pūtia. Ko te kitenga i runga i ia mōkihi he kāinga kāhua nui e nohoia ana e nga rangatira ake. I tēnei wā, kua tīmata te manga parakaaki ki te whakaputa i tētahi odor hōhā puta noa i te mōkihi "B. "Ko te hua, ka whakahaua e te kaiahuwhenua te kaihautū i te inoi mo nga tūkinotanga i takea mai i te pūnaha wai. Ko te tikanga kia waiho te whakawā mo
A.I te mea kaore he kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko, no te mea kāore i roto i te deed ki te kaiahuwhenua ētahi kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko i te whenua.
B.Ko te kaihautū, no te mea ko te take tika a te kaiahuwhenua mo te nui, ehara i te hara.
C.Ko te kaiahuwhenua, nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai te take o nga tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakapae hai take ture.
D.Ko te kaiahuwhenua, no te mea kaore i whai mana te kaihautū ki te whakapai ake i tōna ake whenua i runga i te āhua i tūkino ai ki tētahi atu.
GivenAnswer:
I tēnei āhuatanga, ko te take matua ko te pūnaha wai tūmataiti i hangaia e te kaihautū i runga i ngā mōkihi whenua e rua, ā, kāore i whakamōhiotia te kaiahuwhenua mō tēnei pūnaha i te wā i hokona ai te mōkihi "B" ki a ia. Nā tēnei, kua puta he raruraru nui pēnei i te paraka e rere ana ki te mōkihi "B" me te pūtake o te haunga kino.

Ko te kōwhiringa tika i konei ko te whakatau i te take ture e pā ana ki te kawenga mō ngā tūkinotanga i puta mai i te pūnaha wai. Ko te kaihautū te tangata i hanga te pūnaha wai, ā, kāore i whakamōhio i te kaiahuwhenua mō tēnei āhuatanga i te wā i hokona ai te whenua. Nā reira, ko te kaihautū te tangata e tika ana kia kawea te kawenga mō ngā tūkinotanga i puta.

Ko te kōwhiringa e tika ana ko:
C. Ko te kaiahuwhenua, nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai te take o nga tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakapae hai take ture.

I tēnei kōwhiringa, ko te kaiahuwhenua te kaiwhakapae e tono ana i ngā tūkinotanga mai i te kaihautū nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai i hangaia e te kaihautū te take o ngā raruraru i pā ki te mōkihi "B".

Question:
Ko te tangata te rangatira o te hōtēra hou i hangaia i roto i te taone. I te 15 o Poutāpeta, ka whiwhi waea taua tangata mai i tētahi kaihoko, he kaiwhakanoa taonga hōtēra. Ka tono te kaihoko ki te hoko i te tangata e 1,000 nga whakapoko ahi mo tana hōtēra. Ka kī atu te kaihoko ki te tangata ko te utu o nga whakapoko ahi ko te $35,000 (te $35 rānei), e utu ana i te 90 rā i muri i te tukunga. I kī taurangi te kaihoko kia tāutatia nga whakapoko ahi ā muri ake i te 15 o Āperira. I te 16 o Poutāpeta, ka waea atu te tangata ki te kaihoko, a, ka whakaae ki te tāpae. I te rā e whai ake nei, ka tukuna e te tangata te manatu e whai ake nei ki te kaihoko:"Kia tohutohutia koa kia 15 ōrau te utu mo te utu moni e whitu rā i muri i te tāutanga. " No te 20 o Poutāpeta ka whiwhi te kaihoko i nga tuhinga a te tangata. I te 1 o Āperira, ka tukuna e te kaihoko he waea ki taua tangata, e kī ana: "E mārama ana kāore i a mātau he kānataraki whakaū. Kaore ahau e tuku i nga whakapoko ahi i te 15 o Āperira, i tētahi atu wā rānei. "Ka mauria mai e te tangata he hūtu ki te kaihoko mo te takakino i te kānataraki. E whakapuaki ana te kaihoko i te āraitanga o te tikanga tinihanga i raro i te UCC. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te kōrero tino tika e pā ana ki nga ārai a te kaihoko?
A.He whaimana te ārai a te kaihoko, notemea kāore i tika te manatu a taua tangata ki te tohu i hangaia he kānataraki.
B.He whaimana te ārai a te kaihoko, no te mea he maiorooro te manatu a taua tangata ki nga tikanga o te tukunga waha a te kaihoko.
C.Kāore te ārai a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea kaore te kaihoko i urupare ki te manatu o te tangata i roto i tētahi wā tika.
D.Kāore te parenga a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea i raro i te UCC kāore e pā ana ki ngā whakaaetanga i waenganui i ngā kaihokohoko.
GivenAnswer:
C. Kāore te ārai a te kaihoko i te whaimana, nā te mea kaore te kaihoko i urupare ki te manatu o te tangata i roto i tētahi wā tika.

I tēnei āhuatanga, i whakaae te kaihoko ki te tuku i ngā whakapoko ahi, ā, i muri mai ka whakaae hoki te tangata ki te tāpae. I tukuna e te tangata he tono mō te whakarerekētanga o ngā tikanga utu, engari kāore te kaihoko i urupare ki tēnei tono i roto i tētahi wā tika. I raro i te UCC (Uniform Commercial Code), he mea nui kia whakautu wawe ki ngā tono whakarerekētanga kia kore ai e whakaaetia mā te noho puku. Nā te kore urupare a te kaihoko, ka taea te kī kua whakaaetia te tono a te tangata mā te noho puku. Nā reira, kāore te ārai a te kaihoko i te whaimana i te mea kua whakaaetia te kirimana me ōna whakarerekētanga, ā, kua takahi te kaihoko i te kirimana mā te kore e tuku i ngā whakapoko ahi i te rā i whakaritea.

Question:
Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000. Nā te kānataraki kaiako hou, e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000. He aha te ine mahora hou o nga uara o nga whare i te taone?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Hei tātai i te ine mahora hou o ngā uara o ngā whare i te taone, me mātua mōhio tuatahi ki te tapeke o ngā uara o ngā whare i mua i te whakarerekētanga.

Ki te mea ko te uara toharite o tētahi whare he $125,000, me te ine mahora o te $23,000, ka taea te tātai i te tapeke o ngā whare i te taone pēnei:

\[ \text{Tapeke o ngā whare} = \frac{\text{Uara Tapeke}}{\text{Uara Toharite o tētahi Whare}} = \frac{\$23,000}{\$125,000} = 0.184 \text{ (whare)} \]

Heoi, kāore tēnei tau e tika ana hei tau whare, nā te mea me whai tau katoa mō te maha o ngā whare. Tērā pea he hapa i roto i te whakamārama o te pātai, nā reira ka whakamahi mātou i tētahi huarahi rerekē ki te whakaoti i te pātai.

Ki te whakapiki i ngā uara o ngā whare katoa i te taone mā te $5,000 ia whare, ka piki hoki te uara toharite o tētahi whare ki:

\[ \$125,000 + \$5,000 = \$130,000 \]

Nā te mea e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau, ka piki te ine mahora o ngā uara o ngā whare mā te 10%:

\[ \$23,000 \times 1.10 = \$25,300 \]

Nō reira, ko te ine mahora hou o ngā uara o ngā whare i te taone ko:

B. $25,300

Question:
I mua i te whakatakotoranga o tētahi kaupapa kia hanumi i ngā taone e rua ki runga i te pōti, ka tukuna e te rōia o te kāwanatanga he whakaaro tohutohu e kī ana kāore te mehua, i tōna whakaaro, e takahi ana i ngā whakarato ā-ture, ā-ture rānei. I muri iho, ka whakatakotoria te kaupapa ki runga i te pōti, a, ka tino puta i nga kaipōti i nga taone e rua. I muri i te pōti, engari i mua i te whakahaeretanga o te whakakotahitanga, tokorua nga kaihautū o tētahi o ngā taone i tīmata i te hūtu ki te whakauru i te haumitanga, ka whakaekea te kaupapa o te kaupapa. I tae atu te hūtu ki te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga, a, i kitea he kaupapa ā ture i raro i te kāwanatanga me te ture a te hau. Ināianei ka kōnaetia e nga kaiwhakapae he mōtini e rapu ana kia arotakea tēnei pāhi e te Kōti Matua o U. S. Tērā pea ka taea e te Kōti te kōti
A.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, no te mea i whakataua i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua.
B.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, engari tērā pea i whakahokia ki te kōti o te rohe o te hau.
C.whakarongo ki nga take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.
D.E whakawhirinaki ana ki te whakaaro tohutohu i tāhuahuatia e te rōia o te kāwanatanga, a, kaore e rongo i te take mo ōna painga.
GivenAnswer:
I tēnei āhuatanga, ko te whakatau a te Kōti Matua o U.S. ka whakawhirinaki ki ngā āhuatanga maha, tae atu ki te ahua o ngā take ture e pā ana ki te kēhi. Mēnā kei te pā te kēhi ki ngā take ture ā-motu pērā i ngā take e pā ana ki te Ture a te Hau (federal law) me ngā take ture nui o te kāwanatanga e pā ana ki te mana o te kāwanatanga ki te whakahaere i ōna ake take, ka taea e te Kōti Matua o U.S. te whakarongo ki te kēhi.

Ko te whakaaro tohutohu a te rōia o te kāwanatanga he mea nui, engari ehara i te mea ka mutu te take i reira. Ka taea e te Kōti Matua te arotake i te take ahakoa te tautoko a te rōia o te kāwanatanga mēnā kei te pā te take ki ngā take ture ā-motu nui.

Nā reira, ko te whiringa tika i konei ko:
C. whakarongo ki ngā take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.

Ko tēnei kōwhiringa e whakaatu ana i te āheinga o te Kōti Matua ki te arotake i ngā take e pā ana ki te ture a te hau, engari ka āta whakaaro hoki ki ngā take ture ā-rohe o te kāwanatanga, ā, ka whai wāhi ki te whakatau i te take i runga i ngā ture ā-motu me ngā ture ā-rohe.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I oma atu ahau i runga i te kāpeti hou ma te kaikauhau. Tauari 2 | I mimi ahau ki roto i tōku ringa kia taea ai e au te whakamātau mo te mate.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Ki te tātari i ngā tauari e rua nei, me mātua mārama tātou ki te tikanga o ia tauari me te pānga ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho.

Tauari 1: "I oma atu ahau i runga i te kāpeti hou ma te kaikauhau."
- I tēnei tauari, te āhua nei kei te kōrero mō tētahi mahi kāore i te tino mārama, ā, he uaua ki te whakapono. Ko te rere atu i runga i te kāpeti hou mā te kaikauhau he āhuatanga pakiwaitara, kāore i te tūturu.

Tauari 2: "I mimi ahau ki roto i tōku ringa kia taea ai e au te whakamātau mo te mate."
- Ahakoa he kē tēnei mahi, ka taea te whakamārama i roto i tētahi horopaki hauora, pērā i te kohikohi tauira mimi mō tētahi whakamātautau hauora. Ahakoa he rerekē, kāore tēnei e takahi i ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho mēnā kei te mahia mō tētahi take hauora tika.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020, ko:
C. Kāore i te hē, he hē

Ko te tauari tuatahi he hē nā te mea he pakiwaitara te āhua, ā, ko te tauari tuarua kāore i te hē nā te mea ka taea te whakamārama i roto i tētahi horopaki hauora.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I kite ahau i te Elton Hoani rongonui i waho o tētahi paepae kōnohete, a, ka mau i tētahi pikitia mōna, kaore he pātai ki a ia. Tauari 2 | I pūrongotia e au tētahi atu tautiaki e neke ana i roto i nga rongoā rongoā rongoā ki roto i te whare herehere, a, ka hokona rātau ki nga herehere.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora! Ka tātarihia ngā tauari e rua e pā ana ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho.

Tauari 1: "I kite ahau i te Elton Hoani rongonui i waho o tētahi paepae kōnohete, a, ka mau i tētahi pikitia mōna, kaore he pātai ki a ia." I tēnei tauari, te mahi a te tangata (te tango pikitia o tētahi tangata rongonui me te kore whakaae) ka taea te kī he takahi i te mana whaiaro o Elton Hoani. I roto i ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho, ko te tango pikitia o tētahi tangata me te kore ōna whakaaetanga, ā, i tētahi horopaki pēnei i te kitea i te iwi whānui, ka taea te kī he mahi hē.

Tauari 2: "I pūrongotia e au tētahi atu tautiaki e neke ana i roto i nga rongoā rongoā rongoā ki roto i te whare herehere, a, ka hokona rātau ki nga herehere." I tēnei tauari, te mahi a te tangata (te pūrongo i te mahi tinihanga me te hoko rongoā ki roto i te whare herehere) he mahi tika i raro i ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho, nā te mea e whakaputa ana i te pono me te ārai i ngā mahi ture-kore.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020, ko:
C. Kāore i te hē, he hē.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā tauākī e whai ake nei e tika ana i te mea e pā ana ki ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute?
A.Ko te nuinga o nga huringa i roto i nga whakatau tata kaute e pūrongotia ana mo te whakaaro anō.
B.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā ka puta he huringa i roto i tētahi whakatau tata, i tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te mātāpono kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i runga i te pono.
C.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā kua puta he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.
D.He ngāwari kē atu te whakarerekē i waenganui i tētahi huringa o te whakatau tata kaute me te huringa o te mātāpono kaute i tērā e rerekē ana i waenganui i tētahi huringa i roto i te whakatau tata kaute me te whakatika i tētahi hapa.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tauākī tika mō ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute ko te tauākī A: Ko te nuinga o nga huringa i roto i nga whakatau tata kaute e pūrongotia ana mo te whakaaro anō.

Hei whakamārama:
- Ko ngā huringa i roto i ngā whakatau tata kaute ka pūrongotia hei whakaatu i te whakarerekētanga o te tirohanga, o te mōhiohio rānei e wātea ana i te wā o te whakatau tata tuatahi. Hei tauira, ka taea te whakarerekē i te whakatau tata mō te uara o ngā rawa, te roanga o te ora whaihua o ngā rawa pūmau, te tātaitanga o ngā herenga penihana, me ētahi atu.
- Ko te whakarerekētanga o ngā mātāpono kaute, i te taha kei, he mea nui ake te pūrongo me te whakamārama, nā te mea ka pā tēnei ki te huarahi kaute kua whakamahia, kaua ki te whakarerekētanga o ngā mōhiohio e wātea ana anake.

Ko ngā tauākī B, C, me D kāore e tika ana i te mea e pā ana ki ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute i roto i te horopaki tika.

Question:
He hapa ngā Mutations i roto i te DNA:
A.He whakakino i nga wā katoa.
B.E puta noa iho ana i te aroaro o nga pukupuku.
C.whakanuia te tupunga o te puku.
D.he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.
GivenAnswer:
Ko ngā mutations i roto i te DNA he rerekētanga i te raupapa o ngā pūtake irahiko (nucleotides) o te DNA. Ka taea e ēnei te pā ki ngā āhuatanga maha, pēnei i te hanga o ngā pūmua me ngā mahi a te rauropi. Anei ngā whakamārama mō ngā kōrero i runga ake nei:

A. **He whakakino i nga wā katoa.**  
   Ehara tēnei i te mea pono. Ahakoa he maha ngā mutations ka pā kino, kāore katoa e pērā. He mutations ētahi kaore e pāpāho ana ki te mahi a te rauropi, ā, he pai anō ētahi mutations mā te whakarato i ngā āhuatanga hou, pērā i te ātete ki ngā mate.

B. **E puta noa iho ana i te aroaro o nga pukupuku.**  
   Ehara tēnei i te mea pono. Ka taea e ngā mutations te puta i ngā momo pūtau katoa, ahakoa kei te pāngia e te mate pukupuku te tangata, te kararehe rānei, kaore rānei. He wāhanga noa iho ngā mutations i roto i te tukanga o te ora, ā, ka puta i ngā wā katoa.

C. **Whakanuia te tupunga o te puku.**  
   Ehara tēnei i te mea pono mō ngā mutations katoa. Ētahi mutations ka taea te whakanui i te tupunga o ngā pūtau, ā, tērā pea ka arahi atu ki te mate pukupuku. Heoi, ehara tēnei i te āhuatanga mō ngā mutations katoa.

D. **He iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.**  
   Ehara tēnei i te mea pono. Ka puta ngā mutations i ngā wā katoa i roto i te tukanga o te wehenga pūtau me te tāruarua o te DNA. He wāhanga tēnei o te ora me te whanaketanga o ngā momo ora.

I te nuinga, he rerekē ngā pānga o ngā mutations, ā, ka taea e ēnei te whai hua, te kore pānga, te kino rānei ki te rauropi. Ko te māramatanga ki ngā mutations me ō rātou pānga he mea nui i roto i ngā marautanga pērā i te koiora, te rongoā, me te hangarau koiora.

Question:
Ka haere mai tētahi wahine e 54 tau ki te tari nā te mea kua whakararurarutia e ia te mamae i runga i tōna pāpāringa matau me te kauae i roto i ngā wiki e 3 kua hipa atu nei. Ko ia wāhanga o te mamae e mutu ana mo te 1 hēkona, iti iho rānei. I te nuinga o te wā e whakaohotia ana te mamae e te hau mātao, te ngaungau, te whakatinanatanga, me te paraihe i ōna niho. Kaore ōna mate ki te kanohi, ki te māhunga rānei. He mea whakamīharo te hītori rongoā mo te ānini, te hākinakina, me te mahinga karo korohū. E 165 cm a ia (5 ft 5 i roto) te roa, ā, e 62 kiro (137 whatīanga); Ko BMI e 23 kiro/m2 . He pūnoa nga tohu Vital. Kaore e taea e te tūroro te whakaae ki te pā ki te taha matau o te kanohi. Kaore he ngoikoretanga kanohi, he ngaromanga rānei o te rongo. Kaore he rerekē o te toenga o te whakamātautau ōkiko. Kāore he rerekē o te karapa CT o te māhunga me te kore taumira e whakaatu i ngā rerekētanga. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te rongoā tino tika i tēnei wā?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Hoa Runga
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakaahuatanga o ngā tohumate e pā ana ki tēnei wahine e 54 tau te pakeke e tino ōrite ana ki te mate e mōhiotia ana ko te "trigeminal neuralgia" (neuralgia trigeminal), he mate e pā ana ki te mamae tūturu, poto, me te koi i roto i te mata, e pā ana ki te ara o te io trigeminal. Ko ngā take e whakaoho ai i tēnei momo mamae ko te pa ki te mata, te hau mātao, te kai, te korero, te paraihe rānei i ngā niho, pērā i te kōrero a te wahine nei.

I roto i ngā maimoatanga mō te trigeminal neuralgia, ko te rongoā Carbamazepine te kōwhiringa tuatahi. He pai tēnei rongoā ki te whakahaere i ngā tohumate o te trigeminal neuralgia mā te whakaiti i te kaha o ngā io e pā ana ki te mamae. Ko te Carbamazepine e mōhiotia ana mō tōna kaha ki te whakaiti i te auau me te kaha o ngā wā mamae.

Ahakoa he kōwhiringa anō pērā i a Lamotrigine me Levetiracetam, ko ēnei e whakamahia ana hei rongoā tuarua mēnā kāore te Carbamazepine e pai ana mō te tūroro, mēnā rānei he pānga kino tōna ki te tūroro. Ko te Lamotrigine he pai mō te hunga e kore e taea te tango Carbamazepine nā ngā take pēnei i te mate pāwera. Ko te Levetiracetam he rongoā anō e whakamahia ana i ētahi wā, engari kāore i te tino whai hua pērā i te Carbamazepine mō tēnei momo mate.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika i tēnei wā ko:
A. Carbamazepine

Question:
Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He maha nga stomata
B.Ngā tapahi Thin
C.Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau
D.Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui
GivenAnswer:
I roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike, ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai ka taea te whakauru i ēnei āhuatanga:

A. **He maha nga stomata** - Ehara tēnei i te urutaunga tika mō te whakaiti i te ngaromanga wai i ngā taiao wera, nā te mea ka taea e te maha o ngā stomata te whakanui ake i te ngaromanga wai mā te whakawhānui i te rahinga o te mata e taea ai te whakawhiti hau.

B. **Ngā tapahi Thin** - Kāore tēnei e tika hei urutaunga mō te whakaiti i te ngaromanga wai. Ko ngā rau matotoru ake ka pai ake mō te pupuri i te wai.

C. **Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau** - He urutaunga tēnei e kitea ana i ētahi tipu pērā i te cacti, kei hea ngā āmio (pērā i ngā kākano) e mahi ana hei rau, ā, ka iti ake te ngaromanga wai nā te mea kāore ngā rau nui, whānui e ngāwari ana ki te ngaro wai.

D. **Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui** - Ehara tēnei i te urutaunga tika mō te whakaiti i te ngaromanga wai. Ko te tikanga, ko ngā tipu e whai ana ki te whakaiti i te ngaromanga wai ka whai ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata iti ake kia iti ake ai te wāhi mō te ngaromanga wai.

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai, ko te **C. Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau** hei urutaunga mō ngā tipu ki te whakaiti i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike.

Question:
I roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, me pēhea e taea ai e mātou te tautuhi i te kupu 'whanaketanga'?
A.Ko te wā whanaketanga e pā ana ki te āhuatanga tangata e wātea ai te wāteatanga i te wehi me te hiahia; He rawaka ngā rauemi hei tautoko i te ora, ā, ka tīari tēnei oranga i tētahi āhua e wātea ana i te tuma, i te tuma rānei e mōhiotia ana, o te haukoti ohorere.
B.Kia whakaarohia hei whakawhanake, me tutuki i tētahi iwi ētahi tūnga ohaoha, tōrangapū hoki i roto i te pūnaha āhua o te ao whānui; ko te paearu mō ngā mea e noho ana he āhua 'i hangaia' e aua whakaritenga tauwhitinga i tēnei pūnaha.
C.Ko te whanaketanga he tikanga ki te whakatau i nga rerekētanga e noho tahi ana i te ao whānui. I tēnei horopaki, e pā ana te whanaketanga ki te kaha o te iwi whānui, hapori rānei ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi me te whakanui ake i te tōtika i te whakaputa me te tuari, e whakatoko ana i te tuari moni nui ake i roto i te iwi.
D.Ko te whanaketanga o tētahi hapori e pā ana ki ngā pūnaha uara pūnaha, tika hoki e ohauru ai tōna iwi whānui. I roto i te pūnaha ao whānui o te ao whānui, e pā ana tēnei ki te whakatamarikitanga o ngā ariā manapori ki te uru me te ohaoha o te mākete wātea.
GivenAnswer:
I roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, ko te tautuhi i te kupu 'whanaketanga' ka taea te whakaaro mā te whakamahi i ngā āhuatanga rerekē e whakaaturia ana i roto i ngā whakamārama e whai ake nei:

A. Ko tēnei whakamārama e aro ana ki te āhuatanga tangata me te wātea o ngā rauemi hei tautoko i te ora. Heoi, he iti rawa te kōrero mō te 'whanaketanga' i roto i te horopaki whānui, ā, kāore e tino whakamārama i te tikanga o te kupu i roto i te horopaki o te huri noa.

B. E aro ana tēnei whakamārama ki ngā tūnga ohaoha me tōrangapū i roto i te pūnaha āhua o te ao whānui. Ahakoa he tika tēnei mō te whakamārama i te whanaketanga i roto i tētahi horopaki tōrangapū, kāore i te tino whānui te tirohanga ki ngā āhuatanga katoa o te whanaketanga.

C. Ko tēnei whakamārama e whakarato ana i te tirohanga whānui mō te whanaketanga, e pā ana ki te kaha o te iwi whānui, hapori rānei ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi me te whakanui ake i te tōtika i te whakaputa me te tuari. He pai tēnei mō te whakaatu i te whanaketanga i roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, nā te mea e aro ana ki te whakapai ake i te oranga o te hapori mā te whakamahi pai i ngā rauemi.

D. E aro ana tēnei whakamārama ki ngā pūnaha uara me te tika, me te whakatamarikitanga o ngā ariā manapori. He pai tēnei mō te whakamārama i te whanaketanga i roto i te horopaki tōrangapū, engari kāore e tino whakamārama i te whanaketanga i roto i te horopaki whānui o te huri noa.

I runga i ēnei, ko te whakamārama C te tino tika mō te tautuhi i te kupu 'whanaketanga' i roto i te horopaki o te huri noa, nā te mea e whakarato ana i te tirohanga whānui me te whai whakaaro ki te whakamahi tika i ngā rauemi me te whakanui ake i te tōtika, e tika ana mō te whakapai ake i te oranga o te hapori.

Question:
Whakapaunga miraka nui ake

A.Kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua
B.I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei
C.E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati
D.I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakapaunga miraka i roto i te oranga o te tangata ka pā ki ngā āhuatanga hauora maha. Anei te whakamārama mō ia kōwhiringa i runga i tō pātai:

A. **Kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua** - Ahakoa kua kitea i ētahi rangahau he hononga i waenga i te nui o te kai miraka me te piki o ngā tūpono o te whati, kaore anō kia tino mārama te hononga nei. Me mātua whai whakaaro ki ētahi atu āhuatanga pēnei i te momo kai, te taumata o te mahi tinana, me te kounga o te miraka.

B. **I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei** - He tika tēnei, i te wā o te puberty, ko te whakapiki i te kai o te miraka ka taea te tautoko i te whakawhanaketanga o te kiato kohuke o te wheua, nā te mea he puna nui te miraka o te calcium me ētahi atu matūkai e tika ana mō te hauora o te wheua.

C. **E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati** - Kua kitea i ētahi rangahau he iti ake te mōrea o te whati i roto i ngā tāngata e nui ana te kai miraka, nā te mea ka piki te kiato kohuke o te wheua. Heoi, e hāngai ana tēnei ki te kounga me te rahinga o te miraka e kainatia ana.

D. **I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga** - I ētahi whenua kei reira te mokatere teitei o te whati, pērā i ngā whenua Pākehā, kua kitea he painga o te miraka ki te hauora o te wheua. Heoi, me mātua whai whakaaro ki ngā āhuatanga ahurea me te kai totika whānui.

Ko te whakautu tika ki tō pātai, i runga i ngā kōrero i runga ake nei, ko te kōwhiringa B, nā te mea e whakaatu ana i te hononga pai i waenga i te kai miraka i te wā o te puberty me te kiato kohuke o te wheua i muri ake nei.
